message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I think it's a bit overpriced. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1200000. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $1200000 yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1300000. Can you consider this revised offer?
I understand your need to get closer to your target, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1250000. Can you consider this revised offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking that $1250000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking more along the lines of $1325000. Can you consider this revised offer?

I understand your desire to get closer to your target, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1200000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $1280000. Can you consider this revised offer?
